dataIdInfo.envirDesc: Microsoft Windows 7 Version 6.1 (Build 7601) Service Pack 1; Esri ArcGIS 10.1.1.3143
dataIdInfo.idPurp: The purpose for this data set is to provide a 1:24,000 scale representation of Nez Perce Tribal ownerships within the 1863 reservation area and Craig Mountain area. This coverage is intended to aid tribal level assessment of natural resources and is not intended for use at a scale greater than 1:24,000. Updated December 2014
dataIdInfo.idAbs: Land ownership within the Nez Perce Tribe's 1863 reservation area including the Craig Mountain fee lands. This coverage contains boundary information for Nez Perce tribal properties. Ownership boundaries are approximate locations. This is not a survey grade data set nor is the data set complete.
dataIdInfo.idCredit: Nez Perce Tribe's Land Services - GIS Dept.

Consts.useLimit: The user assumes all responsibility for the accuracy and suitability of this data set for a specific application. In no event will the creators (Nez Perce Tribe, Land Services - GIS Dept.) be liable for damages, including lost profits, lost savings, or other incidental or consequential damages arising from the use of or inability to use this data set. This data set is not survey grade information; therefore, should not be used to define property boundary locations in the field.

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.
